methods.name: a
javadoc: Decrease the size of the stack in slot (first int arg) by the amount of the second int arg. Returns the new stack.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.

methods.name: a
javadoc: the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood. Typically increases an internal count then calls onCrafting(item).

javadoc: the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.
